Description: Painted wooden shabti of T3-ʿ3y with a black striated lappet-wig, a modelled face(incomplete) with coloured features, a black beard and parallel hands in relief; the front of the body is inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in eight rows of yellow inlaid Hieroglyphs; the back is severely damaged.
Dimensions: Height: 33.02 centimetres (object and attached wooden block)
Height: 30.52 centimetres (object, without attached wooden block)
Weight: 594 centimetres (object and attached wooden block)
Condition: incomplete - damage to face and back
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
